scripts.prep: typings install && cp node_modules/d3/d3.min.js node_modules/seedrandom/seedrandom.min.js public/lib/.
scripts.build: npm run prep && browserify playground.ts -p [tsify] | uglifyjs -c > public/lib/bundle.min.js
scripts.watch: npm run prep && watchify playground.ts -p [tsify] -v --debug -o public/lib/bundle.js
